page_content: The page discusses GAFRI, an automated telephone alarm system for mobilizing various leadership bodies and task forces in the event of a disaster.
The page provides information on network partners related to sexual health, child protection, and family support.

The page serves as an introduction and user guide for DSK2, a software developed for Internet Explorer and Mozilla Firefox, focusing on electronic document management and technical documents related to mapping and planning.
The page provides information on the interactive consultation of the cantonal development plan in PDF format.
The page provides information and resources for vocational training, including contacts, educational regulations, and guidelines.
The page serves as a guide for the functional buttons in the DSK2 software, detailing their various capabilities such as adding elements, deleting elements, and exporting data.
The page offers various support measures and mechanisms for students facing challenges during their education, including mediation services and special courses.
The page provides information on how to become a certified training company, detailing the requirements and procedures involved.
